XSRecency 0.2.0

    • Enhanced Estimator

    Reference

    Estimating cross-sectional incidence

    Point and variance estimators for cross-sectional incidence.

    estSnapshot()

    Snapshot estimator and variance (Kaplan and Brookmeyer 1999)

    estAdjusted()

    Adjusted estimator and variance (Kassanjee et al. 2012)

    estEnhanced()

    Get enhanced estimate and variance (Bannick and Gao 2023+). This is an estimator similar to the adjusted estimator, but including optional prior HIV test results.

    Obtaining recent infection testing algorithm

    Functions for obtaining recent infection data from a recent infection assay algorithm

    cephia

    CEPHIA Public Use Dataset

    downloadCephia()

    Download latest CEPHIA dataset

    getRitaOptions()

    See which recency assays are available by HIV subtype

    createRitaCephia()

    Create a dataset based on an algorithm and CEPHIA recency testing data.

    Estimating recency assay parameters

    Functions for estimating test recent function characteristics

    estRitaProperties()

    Estimate a phi function, and output omega

    integratePhi()

    Integrate a phi function to calculate the MDRI or window period

    Simulating datasets

    Functions for simulating datasets

    getTestRecentFunc()

    Approximate test-recent function with given window and shadow period

    simCrossSect()

    Simulates cross-sectional data based on epidemiological parameters.

    simPriorTests()

    Generates prior testing data for positive subjects based on a prior testing distribution and prior testing probability

    simExternal()

    Function to simulate studies that mimic the infection duration data from Duong et al. 2015 (or another external dataset)

    Contents

    Developed by Marlena Bannick.
